summary:
Prof. Dr. Mehdi earned a Doctor of Engineering degree from China, a Master's in Electrical Engineering specialist in biomedical  & Radio astronomy from Sweden, & a Bachelor's in Electronics from Pakistan. supporting the TEMMS (Technology, Engineering, Medical, Mathematics, Science), not STEM. STEM is obsolete now. In Sweden, Prof. Dr. Mehdi worked at the joint lab JPL (NASA) Jet Purpulation Lab & Sweden Onsala Space Lab on the ALMA project in Chile make THz devices.

Prof. Dr Mehdi  main area covers RFICs, MMICs, ASICs, transceivers, radio astronomy THz, & custom-designed MCUs with integrated IPs such as the CEVA-DSP, ARM, RISC-V processor, Bluetooth, transceivers, WiFi, & others. Also work on AI robotics, biomedical device design, mechanical biomedical structure design, MEMS, & nanotechnology.

Prof. Dr. Mehdi Khan opened a start-up company in 2006 named Electromedical, which was renamed Upplysning Robotics in June 2020. It is focused on the development of biomedical devices like total artificial hearts, heart robotic surgery, & AI-DL digital stethoscopes & Radio astronomy.

Moreover, Prof. Dr. Mehdi worked as CTO start-up in  the Chinese Silicon Valley & that company was acquired by world 7 largest company for 100 million RMB, & joined this 7 largest  company as vice president of engineering, the work  involves developing custom-designed ASIC IP & custom-designed MCU chips, making emulation boards, & testing them using FPGAs (DS5) for driverless cars in specific cities. Worked in group RFIC/MMIC/Analog transceiver & component level.
Also worked on the micro/nano THz circuit design for biomedical & radio astronomy in a cleanroom.

Prof. Dr. Mehdi Khan also advised researchers, universities, & industry on  nanostructure device design for the development & fabrication of various nanostructures used for a variety of applications. It ranges from microwaves to THz devices for applications like radio astronomy, medical devices, quantum computer Qbits CPU & MEMS sensors.

Prof. Dr. Mehdi Khan works as a professor of biomedical & Radio astronomy at the university.
Also, Prof. Dr. Mehdi Khan works as a senior consultant for an artificial heart transplant in a hospital with a heart transplant surgeon.

Prof. Dr. Mehdi Khan CEO/co-founded with medical doctor  of the "Aitemad Advanced cardiovascular RnD hospital (Fund Raising)

 The Patients who have been diagnosed with advanced heart failure can have an artificial heart transplant with advanced robotic cardiac surgery.

currentPositions.description:
My primary responsibilities for the mechanical structure design of a complete artificial heart are to test the heart using an MCL (Mock Circulation Loop), fabricate the entire heart using a 3D printer, and produce the titanium body using a 3D EOS machine. Additionally, create a custom-designed MCU for a fully artificial heart. Finally, conduct the animal trial and submit the human trial application for approval.

In addition, develop a digital stethoscope with a BLE chip design capable of identifying cardiac arrhythmia by employing statistical correlation and AI/ML algorithms.

Lastly, cardiac robotics MCU design for heart transplants with enhanced features of artificial intelligence and machine/deep learning to make them more intelligent and  assistant doctors how to do cardiac heart transplants, Moreover, the bio mechanical structure design of cardiac robotics surgery.

International society of Medical, electronics and mechanical circulatory support
organizations.description:
The first International Society of Medical, Electronics and Mechanical Circulatory Support (ISMEMCS) 
in Pakistan. The mission of the ISMEMCS is to provide a broad international forum for intensive discussion of research, development, clinical use, and social acceptance of rotary blood pumps, all related forms of mechanical circulatory support, as well as IC design for medical devices. The ultimate goal is to provide technologies, applications, and clinical procedures for rotary blood pumps, IC design, and related systems 
for saving lives, improving the life quality of recipients, and ensuring the cost-efficient availability of emerging therapies. https://www.isemcs.upplysningavancez.com

organizations.name: journal of Medical, Electronics and Mechanical Circulatory Support
organizations.description:
The first Journal of Medical, Electronics and Mechanical Circulatory Support (JMEMCS) in Pakistan, 
publishes the peer-reviewed journal organized by Upplysning Robotics in Pakistan. It started in 2023 January as the official journal of the Journal of Medical, Electronics and Mechanical Circulatory Support (JMEMCS). 
https://www.pplysningavancez.com/journal/index.php/files/login

message.text:
NASA invented the CUBE, a tiny device, a long time ago. It is a very small device, so you can use any microcontroller device, like Raseberrypi, Ardiuno, etc., with a sensor and camera attached. You can even buy it from the Amazon store. Then you assemble it. Also, you can easily do it at home. This is not difficult.

HEC Pakistan and IST, along with SUPARCO, celebrate! The Chinese Space Agency in China will launch CUBE into space on May 3, 2024, with assistance from the Chinese Shanghai Institute. In summary, I am aware of the hard work and excellence of the Chinese people in everything they do. I am confident that the Chinese engineer did everything and put Pakistan's name into the I-cubic design.

We do not have high-tech companies in Pakistan; even professors study at top universities abroad. But we beg China to put Pakistan's name on some technology to hide their failure. 

It tells Pakistani professors that their IQ in 2024 is still low. In short, Pakistan did not innovate anything, making Pakistan's uneducated generation stupider by around 80 or 90 percent. 

Most of Pakistan's young generation is now thinking of leaving engineering and going to the Amazon store to earn money or something else. We should hold HEC Pakistan and the Pakistani government accountable for their misguided policies. These policies have resulted in the promotion of the wrong individuals for the past 75 years.

And the HEC and Pakistani governments still do not want to change.

I was invited by Netsol to inaugurate the open Silicon Valley in 2023 in February, and the president was a real state agent “Mr Junaid”, and the chairman was a commerce degree holder and worked in the tax office FBR, a retired director. It means a total mismatch with the open Silicon Valley idea. 
So I left the meeting in the middle. I was feeling insulted for joining this type of event where we didn't have a proper team. So now we can see they will have a conference on real state summit to earnings. This does not surprise me. It happens when you do not have a good leader from Silicon Valley. Good Luck

After attending a Chinese university for a period of time, observe biomedical device year-end project exhibitions. As part of my efforts to obtain an NDA from a Chinese semiconductor foundry, I procured research and development apparatus for my organization. Today is my farewell supper.

commentary.text: A country that prioritizes army officers, police officers, or CSS officers over medical doctors, scientists, and engineers will not thrive and will ultimately face destruction. This is all because the British ruled and made the whole nation slaves. Additionally, the British imposed a slave-like mindset on the nation. You will not find this type of attitude in China because they are not slaves, unlike in Pakistan and India. Learn from China.

A country that prioritizes army officers, police officers, or CSS officers over medical doctors, scientists, and engineers will not thrive and will ultimately face destruction. This is all because the British ruled and made the whole nation slaves. Additionally, the British imposed a slave-like mindset on the nation. You will not find this type of attitude in China because they are not slaves, unlike in Pakistan and India. Learn from China.

Sir, for you, watch the 3 Idiots movie by Amir Khan. Bachelor in engineering then did MBA.  That is why Indian universities are far lower than Chinese universities. IIT has a professor like you; I am not surprised. there is a reason indian IQ lower than Chinese. Good luck

Dr. Nadeem Ahmad, I said everything was done by the Chinese from launch to research to financing everything China did. because they were capable. I am not against China, and I worked with them, and I like them. I like their hard work and still work with them. 
But Pakistan's education system has failed very badly, and we don't find any professor who has a cutting-edge  company that can compete with the West. The Chinese have many more  companies than can compete with the West. You are a dean and did a PhD. 
Do you have any company that can compete with the West? 

We don't have a professor with phd who worked in Silicon Valley as a CTO or has a top-notch company in the West or Europe or Pakistan in high tech. But he came back to Pakistan after PhD without experience end up a teacher. 

But the Chinese have. So again Pakistan professor and HEC failed. And still don't want to change 

Please do something, show something, I hope after this message, you will go to SECP to open a company. lastly, learn from China how they succeed. Good luck

Basharat Ali Thank you for your message. I am happy with your work ❤️❤️. So I should tell you I have owned a company for 18 years for high tech during bachelor. I started building my company  Lab 18 years ago. www.upplysningavancez.com. 

We have our society for conferences and our journal for publication. You can visit the website. 

First of all, we don't have a heart transplant doctor in Pakistan. So I collaborate with China at the Chinese Hospital. 
Second, some measurement equipment cannot be bought very expensively, and I have to take it on rent in China and use it there for my artificial heart project test. 
Do you understand?

Second, when I asked a group of professors in Pakistan, HEC top-notch at different universities like FAST, UET, LUMS, and NUST, they insulted me and said this project was not possible. And degrade me. Then I said, Forget them, 

The artificial heart even Chinese does have it. The USA is the pioneer and inventor. 

The high-tech degree holder like in engineering does not have experience during or after their PhD in a high-tech company abroad and eventually ends up teachers in Pakistan. 

This message  is opening a high-tech company in Pakistan to compete with the west
